question: World Thyroid Day observed globally on __________.
explanation: 25th May was declared as the World Thyroid Awareness Day due to the efforts of European Thyroid Association (ETA) and American Thyroid Association (ATA). World Thyroid Awareness Day is a day to create awareness on checking thyroid function regularly, awareness on the disease, and to initiate precautionary action. Theme for World Thyroid Awareness Day 2018 is: Environment and the Thyroid.
